project.Title: Inventory Unlimited Stacks
project.ItemDescription:
[h1][b]COMPATIBLE WITH "CRIMSON COURT"[/b][/h1]
[h1][b]Update to patch 21142[/b][/h1]
Implemented the item of the Shieldbreaker "Aegis Scale" and I have changed the profit of the money from the provisions to its normality (by topics that I do not get to see if it works or not and not to make the game so easy if it really works).
